Package com.cratediggers.controller.frontend.shoppingcart

Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.controller.frontend.shoppingcart.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
ShoppingCart class encapsulates an HashMap. This provides the logic of a shopping cart that can contain various different albums for purchase and their corresponding quantity.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Map<Album,​java.lang.Integer> cart
    HashMap that maps albums to their quantity within a ShoppingCart object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ShoppingCart()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addItem​(Album album)
    Adds a new album object to the cart with a quantity of 1.
    void clear()
    Clears the contents of the cart.
    java.util.Map<Album,​java.lang.Integer> getItems()
    Returns the HashMap that the ShoppingCart object encapsulates.
    float getTotalAmount()
    Calculates the total monetary amount of all albums within the cart.

    Calculates the number of different albums within the cart.

  • Field Details

    • cart

      private java.util.Map<Album,​java.lang.Integer> cart
      HashMap that maps albums to their quantity within a ShoppingCart object.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart()

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Album album)
      Adds a new album object to the cart with a quantity of 1. If album already exists within the cart then the quantity of that key-value is increased by one instead.
      Parameters:
      album - to be added to cart

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem​(Album album)
      Removes an album object from the cart.
      Parameters:
      album - to be removed

    • getTotalQuantity

      public int getTotalQuantity()
      Calculates the total quantity of all albums within the cart. Iterates over key set and returns the sum of all quantity values.
      Returns:
      The total quantity of all albums within the cart

    • getTotalAmount

      public float getTotalAmount()
      Calculates the total monetary amount of all albums within the cart. Iterates over key set and returns the sum of all quantity values multiplied by the price of their corresponding albums.
      Returns:
      The total monetary amount of all albums within the cart

    • updateCart

      public void updateCart​(int[] albumIds, int[] quantities)
      Updates the contents of the cart with an array of albumIds and corresponding array of quantities. Iterates through arrays, constructing new album objects using the albumIds and storing them within the cart alongside their corresponding quantity of the same index.
      Parameters:
      albumIds - array used to create album objects that are put into cart as the key
      quantities - array that are put into cart as the value

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the contents of the cart.

    • getTotalItems

      public int getTotalItems()
      Calculates the number of different albums within the cart.
      Returns:
      The number of different albums within the cart

    • getItems

      public java.util.Map<Album,​java.lang.Integer> getItems()
      Returns the HashMap that the ShoppingCart object encapsulates.
      Returns:
      The HashMap that the ShoppingCart object encapsulates
